commitments.commitment: Keep community updated when there are updates
commitments.quote: I'll keep you all updated when I have updates.

reversals_or_updates.update: Development paused in April due to funding issues
reversals_or_updates.speaker: Mick

key_facts.fact: Mick moved in November and changed jobs in November
key_facts.speaker: Mick

key_facts.fact: Built horse pasture with 225 posts by hand
key_facts.speaker: Mick

key_facts.fact: Development was continuing up until April
key_facts.speaker: Mick

key_facts.fact: About halfway into completing all the abilities necessary for Blitz
key_facts.speaker: Mick

key_facts.fact: Game is already downloadable and technically playable
key_facts.speaker: Mick

key_facts.fact: Mick is available in Discord 24-7 and will respond to questions
key_facts.speaker: Mick
